QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( select e.encid, ch.person_id as PersonId, e.interaction_type, e.interaction_date, e.interaction_time from {sc}.encounter as e JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND e.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE group by encid, ch.person_id, interaction_type, interaction_date, interaction_time )
select a.*, pr.provid provid, 1 as fake, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by a.encid ORDER BY case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end, provider_role) sort_index from a LEFT JOIN {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = a.encid left join {sc}.provider pr on ec.provid = pr.provid order by PersonId
